segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the center of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is trying to reach into a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a small, two-step stool to get high enough.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks incredibly unstable; its legs are splayed and it's tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really concerned he's going to fall at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He has one hand deep inside the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The other hand is holding a plate, perhaps to catch his illicit treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl is standing nearby, clearly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can they be so reckless with that precarious setup?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find it infuriating that no one is supervising this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just asking for an accident to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy seems completely oblivious to the danger he's in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout at him to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to secure that stool immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This carelessness is truly frustrating to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
